author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Celularity Announces Formation Of Co With $250 Mln In Funding From Celgene, United Therapeutics, Others
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Celularity:
* ‍CELULARITY ANNOUNCES $250 MILLION IN FUNDING TO DELIVER TREATMENTS FOR CANCER, INFLAMMATORY AND DEGENERATIVE DISEASES, AND FUNCTIONAL REGENERATION​
* CELULARITY SAYS IS ANNOUNCING FORMATION OF CO WITH $250 MILLION IN FUNDING WITH CONTRIBUTIONS FROM CELGENE, UNITED THERAPEUTICS, SORRENTO THERAPEUTICS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
